timeline.message:
[DOCS] Document `include_in_*` nested mapping parms

Adds documentation for the `include_in_parent` and `include_in_root`
mapping parameters for the `nested` mapping datatype.

timeline.bodyText: To me, this description could be hard to understand. An alternate suggestion: "If true, all fields in the nested object are also added to the parent document as standard (flat) fields." A similar suggestion applies to include_in_root below.
